text: Rhenoy () is a village in the Dutch province of Gelderland. It is a part of the municipality of Geldermalsen and is situated about 13 km east of Gorinchem, between Geldermalsen and Leerdam. The village has just over 670 inhabitants. In 2001 it had 510 inhabitants. The name of the village is probably derived from Rhenus (Rhine). The built-up area of the town was 0.17 km² and contained 201 residences.Statistics Netherlands (CBS), Bevolkingskernen in Nederland 2001. (Statistics are for the continuous built- up area). The statistical area "Rhenoy", which also can include the peripheral parts of the village, as well as the surrounding countryside, has a population of around 780.Statistics Netherlands (CBS), Statline: Kerncijfers wijken en buurten 2003-2005. As of 1 January 2005. ==References== Category:Populated places in Gelderland Category:Geldermalsen
title: Rhenoy
